summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2477 for the improvement of West Eightieth Street, West Eighty-first Street, West Eighty-second Street, West Eighty-third Street and West Eighty-fourth Street, each from Third Avenue Northwest to Eighth Avenue Northwest, all in The City of Seattle, by laying watermains therein of proper dimensions and materials, together with all gates, tees, crosses and other appurtenances necessary for the proper water service of said district; under Ordinance No. 26827 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
